column4: Hi! I'm having trouble with my ATi card after upgrading to 6.10. I'm unable to use the correct driver, because X server hangs every time I try. I followed the guide at http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Installation_Guide with no luck. Can someone help me out?
fglrx says something about Tungsten graphics..... any clue?
try searching the exact error msg in the forum
I tried that, but with not much luck
